    Clp.append_row — Function.
    append_row(instance::Optimizer, row::Int, lower::Float64, upper::Float64,
           rows::Vector{Int}, cols::Vector{Int}, coefs::Vector{Float64})

    Given a sparse matrix in the triplet-form (rows, cols, coefs), add row row with upper bound upper and lower bound lower to the instance instance.

    Clp.eval
    Clp.include
    Clp.optionmap
    Clp.replace_inf — Function.
    replace_inf(x::Real)

    Return Inf if x>1e20, -Inf if x<-1e20, and x otherwise.
